word_means: 经理，主管领导，管理人员

means: (公司或机构的)经理，主管领导，管理人员
(统称公司或机构的)行政领导，领导层

example.ex: ...Her husband is a senior bank executive.
example.tran: 她丈夫是银行高级主管。

value.def: An executive is someone who is employed by a business at a senior level. Executives decide what the business should do, and ensure that it is done.

example.ex: A successful job search needs to be as well organised as any other executive task...
example.tran: 成功的求职与执行其他任何任务一样，都需要良好的条理性。

example.ex: I don't envisage I will take an executive role, but rather become a consultant on merchandise and marketing.
example.tran: 我不设想自己将成为管理人员，但很希望成为商品营销顾问。

value.def: The executive sections and tasks of an organization are concerned with the making of decisions and with ensuring that decisions are carried out.

example.ex: ...a chain of shops specialising in pricey executive toys.
example.tran: 专卖价格昂贵的精美玩具的连锁商店

value.def: Executive goods are expensive goods designed or intended for executives and other people at a similar social or economic level.
value.tran: 高级的;精美时髦的;供主管人员使用的

example.ex: He sits on the executive committee that manages Lloyds...
example.tran: 他是管理劳埃德保险公司的执行委员会成员。

example.ex: Some executive members have called for his resignation.
example.tran: 一些执行委员会成员要求他辞职。

example.ex: ...the executive of the National Union of Students.
example.tran: 全国学生会执行委员会

value.def: The executive committee or board of an organization is a committee within that organization which has the authority to make decisions and ensures that these decisions are carried out.
value.tran: 执行委员会；行政委员会

example.ex: The government, the executive and the judiciary are supposed to be separate...
example.tran: 政府、行政部门和司法部门应该彼此分离。

example.ex: The matter should be resolved by the executive branch of government.
example.tran: 这个问题应该由政府的行政部门解决。

value.def: The executive is the part of the government of a country that is concerned with carrying out decisions or orders, as opposed to the part that makes laws or the part that deals with criminals.

trans: (公司或机构的)总经理，总裁；美国总统
执行董事，常务董事，总干事，执行主任
执行委员会；委员会；执委会；行政委员会；干事会

总裁；首席执行官
高阶人才招聘服务；猎头；高级人才寻访；管理人员搜寻；猎头服务
行政机关，行政权，执行权，行政管理权
行政院
执行副总经理
行政会议，执行委员会
(美国总统掌管的)政府行政部门
执行董事会；执行理事会；执委会；执行委员会；执行局
高级主管；高级执行官；高管；高级行政官；高级执行员
执行力；何为执行力；执行能力；执行力文化；做甚真止力

高级管理人员的报酬
